channel.title: Geopolitics on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Geopolitics on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: Belarus: An Overlooked Key to Baltic Security
item.description: Winston Churchill once famously quipped that “Russia is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma”.

item.title: Why Stopping Nord Stream 2 Matters for the Baltics
item.description: Nord Stream 2 is a Russian gas pipeline project running mostly parallel to the current Nord Stream pipeline from Vyborg to Greifswald, Germany.

item.title: Is Baltic Security Important for the U.S., NATO, and Europe? Absolutely!
item.description: The three Baltic States are key members of the NATO defensive alliance.
